meanings.definition: A sweet pastry made of layers of filo dough filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with syrup or honey.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious baklawa after dinner.
meanings.sent2: My friend brought baklawa to the party, and everyone loved it.
meanings.sent3: The baklawa was so sweet, it made my teeth ache!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a baklawa.
meanings.sent5: The baklawa melted in my mouth, leaving a nutty flavor behind.

meanings.definition: A dessert originating in the Middle East.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served authentic baklawa for dessert.
meanings.sent2: During my trip to the Middle East, I tried baklawa for the first time.
meanings.sent3: The baklawa looked like a golden treasure on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as rich and comforting as a piece of baklawa.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of baklawa filled the room, tempting everyone to have a bite.
